channel.title: CVE Feed for TUBITAK -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TUBITAK -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-3825|2024-08-03T17:09:09.506Z -- tubitak -- lider
item.description: On 2.1.15 version and below of Lider module in LiderAhenk software is leaking it's configurations via an unsecured API. An attacker with an access to the configurations API could get valid LDAP credentials.

item.title: CVE-2021-3806|2024-08-03T17:09:09.454Z -- tubitak -- pardus%20software%20center
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability on Pardus Software Center's "extractArchive" function could allow anyone on the same network to do a man-in-the-middle and write files on the system.
